inclusion.criterion: Sedentary lifestyle (planned activity for purpose of health < 2 days/week)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Not engaged in weight loss study or program
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Medications for thyroid, cholesterol, blood pressure, and other conditions at same dose for 2 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Capable of signing consent and willing to provide informed consent and accept randomization assignment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Significant disease: known or signs/symptoms of cardiovascular, metabolic, or pulmonary disease
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Unable to exercise: musculoskeletal, orthopedic, neuromuscular, or other conditions that do not allow exercise or where exercise is contraindicated
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of cardiovascular disease (CAD; s/p 4 vessel CABG), CHF; EF 55%, mild AS, and ventricular tachycardia; s/p ICD. They also have obesity hypoventilation syndrome and obstructive sleep apnea. The patient's current use of continuous positive airway pressure (PAP) for OSA treatment is a significant exclusion criterion.
